@itk-wasm/htj2k

decode encode Decode a High Throughput JPEG2000 codestream and generate an ITK Image




informationOnly - Only read metadata for the image but do not decode the pixel data.

Encode an ITK Image into a High Throughput JPEG2000 codestream
